name: Casino

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership
HouseAdmin

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the signer or owner
attributes.name: onlySigner

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the croupier or owner
attributes.name: onlyCroupier

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Signable constructor sets the original `signer` of the contract to the sender
     account

@dev Allows the current signer to transfer control of the contract to a newSigner
@param _newSigner The address to transfer signership to
attributes.name: transferSigner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current croupier to transfer control of the contract to a newCroupier
@param _newCroupier The address to transfer croupiership to
attributes.name: transferCroupier

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newSigner.
@param _newSigner The address to transfer signership to.
attributes.name: _transferSigner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newCroupier.
@param _newCroupier The address to transfer croupiership to.
attributes.name: _transferCroupier
